summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD F-53 MOTOR HOME. WHILE DRIVING DOWN A HILL AT APPROXIMATELY 20 TO 25 MPH, THE BRAKE WAS ACTIVATED AND THE VEHICLE FAILED TO STOP WITHOUT WARNING. THE MOTOR HOME WAS SHIFTED TO TOW HAUL AND THE MOTOR HOME STOPPED. THE FAILURE RECURRED MULTIPLE TIMES. THE MOTOR HOME WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 2,000.  MA 09/25
